meanings.definition: Used to refer to the person being addressed as the object of a verb or preposition.
meanings.sent3: Don't forget to feed yourself before the cat!
meanings.sent4: Sometimes you need to be your own hero and save yourself.
meanings.sent5: Make sure to take care of yourself first before helping others.

meanings.definition: Used to emphasize the role of the person being addressed in a particular situation.
meanings.sent1: Wow, yourself, you really aced that test!
meanings.sent2: Hey, yourself, don't forget to bring the umbrella.
meanings.sent3: Oh no, yourself, did you really eat all the cookies?
meanings.sent4: Surprise, yourself, you just won the lottery!
meanings.sent5: Look at yourself, shining bright in the spotlight.

meanings.definition: Used to refer to the person being addressed as the object of a verb or preposition.
meanings.sent1: You should be proud of yourself.
meanings.sent3: Make sure to save some cake for yourself.
meanings.sent4: In the end, you are the only one who can truly understand yourself.
meanings.sent5: Always believe in yourself, no matter what others say.
